original_text: For six days work is to be done, but the seventh day is a day of sabbath rest, holy to the Lord. Whoever does any work on the Sabbath day is to be put to death.
korean_text: 엿새 동안은 일할 것이나 일곱째 날은 큰 안식일이니 여호와께 거룩한 것이라 안식일에 일하는 자는 누구든지 반드시 죽일지니라

sentences.original_text: For six days work is to be done
but the seventh day is a day of sabbath rest
Whoever does any work on the Sabbath day
is to be put to death
